page.title: 17TRADE
page.content: Shopping is difficult without a car. Nearest shops in Buckingham 4 miles away. If one needs a coat or dinner service' one goes to Milton Keynes or Northampton. Papers are delivered; postman brings mail and the milkman dairy products plus potatoes, bread etc if ordered. All these services are in- valuable to the elderly - being often the only contact they have during the day. A vegetable carrier visits once a week and mobile shop, but at 9 pm! Recently a post office was reopened in Akeley and the owner of the Old School has Planning permission for a shop. The local pub is popular with folk wishing to eat and many locals do not bother to patronise it. There is bad feeling' here.
